title: Switch background/dot colors
message_prompt: I want the background to be black, and the dots to be white.
message_edit:
I will update the CSS to change the background color to black and modify the Dot component to change the dot color to white.

Steps:
1. Update the `body` style in `index.css` to have a black background.
2. Modify the `meshStandardMaterial` color in `Dot.js` to be white.
